edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.animation

Class KeyframeAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math.curve.Curve<Orientation>
      • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.animation.KeyframeAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animation

    public class KeyframeAnimation
extends Curve<Orientation>
implements Animation
    Represents a animation created by a sequence of "frames", where each frame consists of a position, rotation, and scaling of the object this animation can be applied to.
